trans-unit.source: Provides methods for sharing and readapting add-ins.
trans-unit.target: 提供共用和重新配接增益集的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use this class to share an add-in with another host that does not have the same pipeline to that add-in (particularly, another host that does not have the same host view of the add-in).
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別並沒有相同的管線，該增益集的另一部主機與共用的增益集 （特別是，沒有相同的另一部主機裝載的增益集的檢視）。

trans-unit.source: If you need to adapt an activated add-in from its host view to the contract, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractAdapter.ViewToContractAdapter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要調整啟動增益集從其主機 檢視的合約，請使用<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractAdapter.ViewToContractAdapter%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you have an instance of the contract and need to convert it to the host view, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractAdapter.ContractToViewAdapter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有合約的執行個體，而且需要將它轉換成主機 檢視，使用<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractAdapter.ContractToViewAdapter%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Obtains a host view of an add-in if a suitable host-side adapter is found at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定位置找到合適的主應用程式端配接器，則會取得增益集的主應用程式檢視。

trans-unit.source: The type that defines the host view of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 定義增益集主應用程式檢視的型別。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the contract used by the add-in to be shared.
trans-unit.target: 增益集要用於共用的合約控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The host's application base.
trans-unit.target: 主應用程式基底。

trans-unit.source: Obtains a host view of an add-in if a suitable host-side adapter is found at a location specified by a value from the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如果在由 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation" /> 列舉的值所指定之位置找到合適的主應用程式端配接器，則取得增益集的主應用程式檢視。

trans-unit.source: The host view of the add-in that is shared.
trans-unit.target: 共用之增益集主應用程式檢視。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, an entity has an instance of a contract and wants to adapt it to a particular view.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，實體具有合約的執行個體，而且想要調整至特定的檢視。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to query the system to find and instantiate an adapter to convert into that view.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來查詢系統以尋找並具現化配接器以轉換成該檢視。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="location" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: The type that defines the host view of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 定義增益集主應用程式檢視的型別。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the contract used by the add-in to be shared.
trans-unit.target: 增益集要用於共用的合約控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A path to the add-in store.
trans-unit.target: 增益集存放區的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Obtains a host view of an add-in if a suitable host-side adapter is found at a location specified by a path.
trans-unit.target: 如果在路徑指定之位置找到合適的主應用程式端配接器，則取得增益集的主應用程式檢視。

trans-unit.source: The host view of the add-in that is shared.
trans-unit.target: 共用之增益集主應用程式檢視。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, an entity has an instance of a contract and wants to adapt it to a particular view.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，實體具有合約的執行個體，而且想要調整至特定的檢視。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to query the system to find and instantiate an adapter to convert into that view.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來查詢系統以尋找並具現化配接器以轉換成該檢視。

trans-unit.source: The host view of an add-in activated by the system from the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 由系統從目前應用程式定義域啟動之增益集主應用程式檢視。

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle to the contract for a provided host view of an add-in.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供之增益集主應用程式檢視的合約控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the contract.
trans-unit.target: 合約的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the source entity (a host) has an add-in that wants to be shared by a destination entity (another host).
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，來源實體 （主機） 有想要共用的目的地實體 （另一部主機） 的增益集。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to obtain the handle to the contract that was instantiated for the source entity by the add-in system.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法取得的控制代碼的來源實體增益集系統具現化的合約。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="view" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="view" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
